name: Team Profile Generator
shortDescription: A command line app that creates an HTML file to display team data.
longDescription: A command line app that asks a user a series of questions about their team and then using the answers, creates an HTML file to display the data.

name: README Generator
shortDescription: A command line app that creates a README.md file.
longDescription: A command line app that asks a user a series of questions and then using the answers, creates a README.md file.

name: Weather App
shortDescription: A simple weather app that allows users to see the current weather for their location.
longDescription: A simple weather app that allows users to see the current weather for their location.

name: Work Day Scheduler
shortDescription: A daily planner for logging tasks during the work day.
longDescription: A daily planner for logging tasks during the work day. Built using HTML, CSS, Javascript and jQuery. I also used a third-party API - moment.js

name: Food2Go
shortDescription: A single page application that allows a user to choose a country and see dishes from that country.
longDescription: When travelling it isn't always easy to find ingredients and nutritional information about the local dishes. That's where Food2Go comes in. Food2Go is a single page application that allows a user to choose a country and see dishes from that country. When a specific dish is chosen, a list of ingredients and nutritional information is displayed.

name: Portfolio
shortDescription: This portfolio is designed and developed, by me, to showcase my work.
longDescription: This portfolio is designed and developed, by me, to showcase my work. I created this portfolio using React.js
